original_title: The Winery Dogs - Unleashed in Japan
overview: "Unleashed in Japan" is the first live album of the Hardrock veterans around Mike Portnoy, Billy Sheehan and Richi Kotzen. On "Unleashed in Japan" you can find four tracks, which can't be found on the debut, plus six songs of the debut, live recorded in Japan.
title: The Winery Dogs - Unleashed in Japan
